description.en: Son of Chāyāvana Acyuta, He was Gurumūrthi by name (before initiation); having adorned the seat of Jagadguru for forty-seven years, He attained on the night of Kālāṣṭamī of the month Kārtika in the year Parābhava—the Supreme state denoted by the term Paramātman.

shlokas:
chAyAvanAcyutasutO gurumUrtinAmA sthitvA jagadgurupadE chavi(47)varSakAlam.
prAptO'parAbhavapadaM sa parAbhavOrjakAlASTamInizi padaM paramAtmasaMjJam..96..
—puNyazlOkamaJjarI
